tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficViolations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_plate_number VARCHAR(50),
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  officer_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_license_plate VARCHAR(10),
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  fine_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE citations (
  citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  issued_date DATE,
  officer_name VARCHAR(50),
  CONSTRAINT fk_violation FOREIGN KEY (violation_id) REFERENCES traffic_violations(violation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  street_name VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  plate_number VARCHAR(20) PRIMARY KEY,
  make VARCHAR(50),
  model VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plate_number VARCHAR(20),
  camera_id INT,
  violation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE citations (
  citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Violations (
    violation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id UUID,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    violation_type TEXT,
    violation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Citations (
    citation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_id UUID,
    fine_amount DECIMAL,
    citation_date DATE,
    payment_status TEXT
);
